effects: Increase resistance to Poison, Blind, Sleep and Confusion by 100%
Gain Sun Cupid+ (910899) at the start of the turn if Cupid Luna is alive
name: Sun Cupid
Sun Cupid
陽光邱比特
태양의 큐피드
Cupidon solaire
Sonnen-Amor
Cupido apoliano
desc_short: Boost ATK by 40% and boost light resistance and nullify poison, blind, sleep and confusion, and boost ATK and DEF when Cupid Luna is alive during battle
提高40%攻擊的數值+提高光屬性耐性的數值+中毒失明睡眠混亂無效+當「愛神露娜」為可戰鬥狀態時提高攻擊防禦的數值
공격력 40%, 빛속성 저항력 상승+독, 암흑, 수면, 혼란 무효화+'큐피드 루나'가 전투 가능 상태 시 공격력과 방어력 상승
Augmente l'ATT de 40%, la résistance à la lumière et annule poison cécité sommeil et confusion, augmente l'ATT et la DEF tant que Luna-Cupidon est en vie en combat
Erhöht ANG um 40%, erhöht Lichtresistenz und annulliert Gift, Blind, Schlaf, Konfus und erhöht ANG/ABW, wenn Amor-Luna während dem Kampf lebendig ist.
Aumenta ATQ un 40% y la res. a la luz, anula ven, ceg, sue y con, y aumenta ATQ y DEF cuando Luna Cupido está viva durante el combate
